title: Yogi Organic Detox Energy Tea x12
description: Do you sometimes feel the urge to experience a moment of attention that only concerns you? Enjoying a cup of "YOGI® Detox Energy" with dandelion with sweet and bitter notes, nettle and sparkling lemon helps you "detoxify" from the influences to which you are exposed every day. cleaned_text: Do you sometimes feel the urge to experience a moment of attention that only concerns you? Enjoying a cup of "YOGI® Detox Energy" with dandelion with sweet and bitter notes, nettle and sparkling lemon helps you "detoxify" from the influences to which you are exposed every day. Live this moment to appreciate yourself, your thoughts and your feelings.
